title: Enchanting Vaibhavam Necklace: A Symphony of Emeralds, Rubies, and Diamonds
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central Emerald gemstone (cabochon cut)
accented by Ruby beads and brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI clarity
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a delicate vine pattern interspersed with floral motifs, all meticulously set with shimmering diamonds. The pendant features a central emerald, surrounded by a halo of diamonds and complemented by ruby drops. A modern take on traditional South Indian designs, ideal for the contemporary bride or special occasion.
occasions: and other significant milestones. Its elegant design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The high-quality gemstones and meticulous craftsmanship ensure a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. The lightweight design provides comfortable wear for extended periods. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability.
